mapper.insert: insert into reply (comment, author_id, author_name, selection_id, update_time) values (#{comment}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{idealSelectionId}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update reply set comment = #{reply.comment}, author_id = #{reply.userId}, author_name = #{reply.userName}, selection_id = #{reply.idealSelectionId}, update_time = #{reply.updateTime} where id =#{id}
